DOC.brief_title: A Two-arm Intervention Study With Parallel Process Evaluation Assess Feasibility , Acceptability Fidelity eMotion Online Intervention People With Depressive Symptoms .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomise control trial ( RCT ) design use study . 120 participant experience depressive symptom ( > 10 PHQ-8 ) age 18 recruit community . Participants eligible participate 18 , score 10 PHQ-8 , able walk unaided least 5 minute access internet . Following baseline measure , participant randomise 1:1 ratio intervention wait list control arm follow 2 5 month . Those randomised intervention arm receive eMotion comprise series weekly audio visual module design increase exposure positive activity physical activity . Main outcomes interest include recruitment , retention , fidelity acceptability . Baseline follow measure also include PHQ-8 , objective ( GENEActvie accelerometer ) subjective ( IPAQ ) measure physical activity . A parallel process evaluation run alongside RCT . If effective , intervention potential improve depressive symptom wide range hard reach people community increase physical activity . Further evaluation full scale RCT plan pending result trial .
